name: ip8etu0g25
operations:
[
 {
  "data_source": "Site DB",
  "raw_sql": "SELECT mr.name AS material_request,
       mr.transaction_date AS mr_date,
       mr_item.item_code AS mr_item_code,
       mr_item.item_name AS mr_item_name,
       mr_item.qty AS requested_qty,
       mr.department AS department,
       mr.material_request_type AS request_type,
       MIN(po.name) AS purchase_order,
       MIN(po.transaction_date) AS po_date,
       SUM(po_item.qty) AS po_qty,
       ROUND(AVG(po_item.rate), 2) AS po_rate,
       ROUND(SUM(po_item.amount), 2) AS po_amount,
       MIN(pr.name) AS purchase_receipt,
       MIN(pr.posting_date) AS receipt_date,
       SUM(pr_item.qty) AS received_qty,
       ROUND(AVG(pr_item.rate), 2) AS received_rate,
       ROUND(SUM(pr_item.amount), 2) AS received_amount,
       MIN(pi.name) AS purchase_invoice,
       MIN(pi.posting_date) AS invoice_date,
       SUM(pi_item.qty) AS invoiced_qty,
       ROUND(AVG(pi_item.rate), 2) AS invoiced_rate,
       ROUND(SUM(pi_item.amount), 2) AS invoiced_amount,
       MIN(pi.supplier) AS supplier,
       MIN(se.name) AS stock_entry,
       MIN(se.posting_date) AS stock_entry_date,
       MIN(se.purpose) AS purpose,
       SUM(se_item.qty) AS issued_qty,
       mr.company AS company
FROM `tabMaterial Request Item` mr_item
INNER JOIN `tabMaterial Request` mr ON mr.name = mr_item.parent
AND mr.docstatus != 2
LEFT JOIN `tabPurchase Order Item` po_item ON po_item.material_request = mr.name
AND po_item.item_code = mr_item.item_code
LEFT JOIN `tabPurchase Order` po ON po.name = po_item.parent
AND po.docstatus != 2
LEFT JOIN `tabPurchase Receipt Item` pr_item ON pr_item.purchase_order = po.name
AND pr_item.item_code = mr_item.item_code
LEFT JOIN `tabPurchase Receipt` pr ON pr.name = pr_item.parent
AND pr.docstatus != 2
LEFT JOIN `tabPurchase Invoice Item` pi_item ON (pi_item.purchase_receipt = pr.name
                                                 OR pi_item.purchase_order = po.name)
AND pi_item.item_code = mr_item.item_code
LEFT JOIN `tabPurchase Invoice` pi ON pi.name = pi_item.parent
AND pi.docstatus != 2
LEFT JOIN `tabStock Entry Detail` se_item ON se_item.material_request = mr.name
AND se_item.item_code = mr_item.item_code
AND se_item.docstatus = 1
LEFT JOIN `tabStock Entry` se ON se.name = se_item.parent
AND se.docstatus = 1
GROUP BY mr_item.name,
         mr.name,
         mr.transaction_date,
         mr_item.item_code,
         mr_item.item_name,
         mr_item.qty,
         mr.material_request_type,
         mr.company,
         mr.department
ORDER BY mr.transaction_date DESC,
         mr.name,
         mr_item.item_code",
  "type": "sql"
 }
]
title: Full CycleÂ

name: 4ebua4vtnl
bshm36ij1i
operations:
[
 {
  "data_source": "Site DB",
  "raw_sql": "SELECT po.name AS "PO Number",
       po.transaction_date AS "Date",
       po.status AS "Status",
       po.grand_total AS "PO Total",
       po.supplier AS "Supplier",
       poi.item_name AS "Item Name",
       poi.item_code AS "Item Code",
       po.company AS "Company",
       poi.material_request AS "Material Request",
       mr.transaction_date AS "Material Request Date",
       poi.rate AS "Item Price",
       poi.qty AS "Quantity",
       poi.amount AS "Amount",
ROUND(
    (poi.amount / NULLIF(SUM(poi.amount) OVER (), 0)) * 100,4) AS percent_of_total,
  poi.supplier_quotation AS "Supplier Quotation",
       sq.transaction_date AS "Supplier Quotation Date",
       DATEDIFF(sq.transaction_date, mr.transaction_date) AS "Procurement Team Lead Time (Days)",
       po.owner AS "Owner",
       i.item_group AS "Category",
       poi.uom AS "UOM",
       po.terms AS "Terms and Conditions",
       poi.cost_center AS "Cost Center",
       mr.owner AS "Requester",
       mr.department AS "Department",
       ve.creation AS "Vendor Evaluation Date",
       ve.total_supplier_score_ AS "Vendor Evaluation Score",
       s.supplier_group AS "Supplier Group",
       CASE
           WHEN LEFT(poi.item_code, 3) = 'ELC' THEN 'Electricity'
           WHEN LEFT(poi.item_code, 3) = 'RAW' THEN 'Raw Material'
           WHEN LEFT(poi.item_code, 3) = 'SER' THEN 'Services'
           WHEN LEFT(poi.item_code, 3) IN ('MET',
                                           'JUC',
                                           'GOY',
                                           'DIR',
                                           'CNY',
                                           'BVG',
                                           'BUF',
                                           'VGT',
                                           'FRT',
                                           'SFD',
                                           'SPS',
                                           'NUT',
                                           'BKR') THEN 'Food & Beverage'
           WHEN LEFT(poi.item_code, 3) = 'GEN' THEN 'General'
           WHEN LEFT(poi.item_code, 3) = 'PAI' THEN 'Paints'
           WHEN LEFT(poi.item_code, 3) = 'PAC' THEN 'Packaging'
           WHEN LEFT(poi.item_code, 3) = 'TIL' THEN 'Tile'
           WHEN LEFT(poi.item_code, 3) = 'PLU' THEN 'Plumbing'
           WHEN LEFT(poi.item_code, 3) = 'MAI' THEN 'Main'
           WHEN LEFT(poi.item_code, 3) = 'STA' THEN 'Stationary'
           WHEN LEFT(poi.item_code, 3) = 'SAF' THEN 'Safety'
           WHEN LEFT(poi.item_code, 3) = 'CLE' THEN 'Cleanliness'
           WHEN LEFT(poi.item_code, 3) = 'ITE' THEN 'Information Technology'
           WHEN LEFT(poi.item_code, 3) = 'KEQ' THEN 'Kitchen Equipment'
           WHEN LEFT(poi.item_code, 3) = 'CED' THEN 'Consumer Electronics Devices'
           WHEN LEFT(poi.item_code, 3) = 'CAR' THEN 'Carpenter'
           WHEN LEFT(poi.item_code, 3) = 'UNI' THEN 'Uniform'
           WHEN LEFT(poi.item_code, 3) = 'TOL' THEN 'Tools'
           WHEN LEFT(poi.item_code, 3) = 'OFU' THEN 'Offices and Furniture'
           WHEN LEFT(poi.item_code, 3) = 'AIR' THEN 'Air Conditioning'
           WHEN LEFT(poi.item_code, 3) = 'ASS' THEN 'Fixed Assets'
           WHEN LEFT(poi.item_code, 3) = 'AGR' THEN 'Agricultural'
           WHEN LEFT(poi.item_code, 3) = 'SCT' THEN 'Tempered Glass'
           WHEN LEFT(poi.item_code, 3) = 'FIF' THEN 'Fire Fighting'
           WHEN LEFT(poi.item_code, 3) = 'INS' THEN 'Insulation'
           WHEN poi.item_code LIKE 'MX-%' THEN 'Services'
           ELSE 'Unclassified'
       END AS "Procurement Category"
FROM `tabPurchase Order` po
INNER JOIN `tabPurchase Order Item` poi ON po.name = poi.parent
LEFT JOIN `tabMaterial Request` mr ON poi.material_request = mr.name
LEFT JOIN `tabSupplier Quotation` sq ON poi.supplier_quotation = sq.name
LEFT JOIN `tabItem` i ON poi.item_code = i.name
LEFT JOIN `tabSupplier` s ON s.name = po.supplier
LEFT JOIN `tabVendor Evaluation` ve ON po.name = ve.purchase_order
WHERE po.docstatus = 1;",
  "type": "sql"
 }
]
title: Query 3

WHERE po.docstatus = 1;",
